website_summaries.verdict: Affordable laptop that can run Windows 10 as well as various Linux distrobutions. Ideal for students, basic computing or as a second PC.
pros: Great starter laptop for Linux users

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased this same laptop several times for my son. It's the only one he likes. he's autistic, finds it very easy to use, good picture and sound. I've seen a lot of reviews about losing the wifi connection. That is a power save feature that can be corrected. It's a great laptop, relatively inexpensive, lightweight, cute colors.
customer_reviews.author: Deb M

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I was unaware that the Windows 10 S Mode will only let you download things that are from Microsoft. I had to make a long call with Microsoft Tech Support, and they undid the S Mode so I could download Google Chrome.
customer_reviews.author: Connie C.

customer_reviews.title: Worst Computer EVER DONT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Worst computer ever! DO NOT BUY! This computer is so slow and allows you to do nothing because it freezes I truly wasted my money and I have to write this review so no one else will make the same mistake!
customer_reviews.author: Toya

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT buy
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could give this product negative stars. I Purchased one it did not connect to the Internet and when I called HP support they told me that sometimes some computers just won’t be able to connect to the Internet. That was their helpful response. I returned it and purchased a new one. This new one did not connect to the Internet either. HP refused to help me and told me I would need to purchase support plans despite the computer being a week and a half old. Go with a different company. Do not use HP
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Very compact and perfect
customer_reviews.text: I love this product it’s perfect to browse the internet or take care of light work. It’s lightweight and durable and has a good battery life
customer_reviews.author: Kristy Bianco

customer_reviews.title: No internet.
customer_reviews.text: HP support is fabulous, very good. But they couldn’t get my new laptop to stay connected to the internet. Tried for hours. It says I’m securely connected but any page I try to go to says otherwise. Ran all the diagnostics and it all checked out as working fine. But I can’t go to any sites. Once in a while it will load, but then I get this page again after a few minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Brugger

customer_reviews.title: Love this laptop NOW
customer_reviews.text: I almost sent this laptop back, but...Sam from Amazon stayed on the phone with me and called HP, They tried to get it to stay connected to the internet with no luck. It would stay on for maybe 15 mins, and then disconnect again and again. So finally HP sent a FedEx box to send it in. Took about 2 weeks to get it back, but now it works like a charm. Hasn't disconnected yet, and I've had it on for about 3 days. Some people say it's slow, I don't think so. I love this laptop now, plenty fast enough, and oh so cute. Highly recommended, but only after sending it to HP for an internet connection fix.
customer_reviews.author: Cat1332

customer_reviews.title: Little more than an email getter.
customer_reviews.text: Keeps disconnecting from internet. Slow internet page loading on Chrome, even slower on IE. Waste of money. Bought for using Silhouette Cameo, checked specs before ordering, but runs so slow it's unusable. Will probably stick it in a guest room for when we have company.
customer_reviews.author: sistersoe

customer_reviews.title: Replaced once now working with warranty
customer_reviews.text: First one WIFI would connect but webpages could not be displayed. Hours with HP support. Returned due to bad network card. Second one received. It worked great for a few hours and then the same problem. Working with HP to fix under warranty. Maybe then I can get a working laptop
customer_reviews.author: David Feller

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t want to recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.text: I like how the laptop is super light and portable. But ijust received this laptop and it keeps going offline... and it’s super slow I would NOT want to recommend this product to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: If you need quality consistent internet, this is not the computer for you
customer_reviews.text: It was promoted as being reliable with wifi access. I was not able to maintain an internet connection for more than a few minutes at a time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dont waste your money!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love the colour however there is a major issue with the wifi, which keeps disconnecting. I have to shut down the laptop to reconnect and that dont always work. Another issue is certain application you open the laptop freezes. If these are corrected this would be the perfect introductory for kids to start school.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Haldane

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love the colour however there is a major issue with the wifi, which keeps disconnecting. I have to shut down the laptop to reconnect and that dont always work. Another issue is certain application you open the laptop freezes. If these are corrected this would be the perfect introductory for kids to start school.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Haldane

customer_reviews.title: Eh
customer_reviews.text: I’m not a fan. It doesn’t have much memory and the battery doesn’t stay charged. More than likely I will be sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: Dwight

customer_reviews.title: This computer bites.
customer_reviews.text: It loses its connection to WiFi/Internet constantly. It freezes willy nilly. It sucks.
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Good for OLder Adults But A Little Sluggish
customer_reviews.text: I've alway been a fan of this line of HP mini laptops. Having owned an older one, I thought this would make an excellent replacement. Nope! The first problem is that the power button stopped illuminating. Then I discovered that SSD chips don't lock into place and can easily fall out when moving this unit around. The CPU seems to be underpowered for this unit and browsing seems a bit sluggish. The screen and keyboard are good sized, making it good for older adults with poor eyes and clumsy fingers. Perhaps it was just my unit that was defective which I replaced with another HP Stream with a smaller screen, but better CPU.
customer_reviews.author: BatBoy

customer_reviews.title: keeps going offline
customer_reviews.text: It is good except within 20 minutes of being online, it will go offline. I've done everything that it instructs me to do to keep it online, but it continue to happens. I wifi from my own secured internet & it continues to do it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat the price
customer_reviews.text: For the price, it's great, beautiful color, simple to use..No regrets at all. I just opened it, and it didn't have the mouse, pad ear plugs blue case as shown on the extra items shown.
customer_reviews.author: WILLIAM GERHART JR

customer_reviews.title: Seemed like a dream come true.......NOT!
customer_reviews.text: This seems like the perfect computer for cruising the net and some word processing. NOT! It constantly disconnects from the wifi. Every 7-8 minutes. And when it's not offline, the pages still won't load. I'm very disappointed! I had a GREAT HP Chromebook for 6 years and thought I had found a wonderful Windows substitute. NOT! I have not called customer service, those experiences are just too painful. I expect laptops to work out of the box with no assistance, not rocket science. Will be returning, and --sigh!-- I guess I'll have to spend more money. Very disillusioned with HP after this experience.
customer_reviews.author: Suomex

customer_reviews.title: DONT WASTE MONEY
customer_reviews.text: Do NOT purchase this if you can help it!! It’s the slowest computer on earth. It’s slow, shuts down easily and doesn’t really allow apps to run such as YouTube, Netflix, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Kihya Houston

customer_reviews.title: The worst computer I've owned
customer_reviews.text: This computer is the slowest computer ever. Freezes all the time and is useless
customer_reviews.author: Camila Donoso

customer_reviews.title: Slow
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in April and already hate it. This computer runs ridiculously slow. It is hard to get any work completed because it just does not load. (I bought this for business purposes). I dread using this computer and wish I would have shopped around more. I have used HP products in the past and loved them. This one is disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Clark

customer_reviews.title: Not fit for SIMS 4
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my wife to play the Sims 4 on and for casual internet surfing. I knew going into it that it didn't have a lot of memory but should have been able to run the game she wanted as we were going to install it to an external harddrive. Really wish this came as a better computer because we both loved the look and color. Ended up replacing with a bland different laptop. This would be fine for light use though since it comes with a year of Microsoft Office and you can always purchase an external harddrive for more memory.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Use it for college courses
customer_reviews.text: I want to love my beautiful laptop, but unfortunately it keeps disconnecting from my internet and I don’t know why :( I’m also confused as to why the papers say I should have a one year warranty, but when I log on, it says 5 months remaining.
customer_reviews.author: Ada

customer_reviews.title: Update BIOS and WiFi driver!!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our daughter for Christmas after quite a bit of research. I was a little reluctant due to the reviews about it dropping Internet connection. I was hopeful we’d get lucky. Unfortunately, we didn’t. We had issues with internet connection dropping every few minutes right out of the box. I spent most of Christmas Day researching solutions. A BIOS and WiFi driver update seemed to resolve the problem, but what a pain! Get it together HP. This is clearly a significant issue if many users are experiencing this. Otherwise, this is a perfect laptop for our kiddo.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael

customer_reviews.title: Love this laptop
customer_reviews.text: I love it!! This laptop is just what I need for the few things I need to use a computer for. I would definitely recommend this laptop to a friend or family member.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: It Does What it's Supposed to
customer_reviews.text: I was perfectly satisfied with my 5-6 year old laptop, but Microsoft stopped honoring its commitment to update my operating system, forcing me to buy a new laptop I didn't need. This is a good laptop, but the new system is difficult to learn as compared to the old one, not nearly as user friendly, but gets me online to the things I need. The worst part is trying to transfer all my files over from my old laptop. Not yet sure how that's going to work, but hope it does. It's a decent enough laptop, but should have been cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Is not new is actually a returned item
customer_reviews.text: Advertised as brand new, but is actually a returned item. What i got was a used locked notebook owned by a mister nelson yacapin. Came locked. My "brand new " chromebook needs a password from someone i dont know. Cant believe i pay for prime only to be scammed just like in any other free website.
customer_reviews.author: freisa c.

customer_reviews.title: Quick Replacement
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this as a replacement to a computer that I had for 5 years that suddenly stopped working. This computer came in handy and arrived quickly. The only downside is the storage. It is minimum, but it's doing what I need it to do in this moment. External storage can be added. Another is the lack of a CD/DVD build in. I had to get a separate external drive for movies and dvds. For the "old school" individual that prefers more tangible entertainment experiences, prepare to get a projector and/or external drives. Overall works really well.
customer_reviews.author: HL

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfactory purchase
customer_reviews.text: This is my first home laptop which was purchased to engage in Zoom meetings which have become a necessity of recent times. I have been very pleased with the product, it's easy to use functions and portability (which my desktop obviously doesn't have). I have not encountered problems with wifi as reported by some purchasers. The only issue was that I did have to convert to Windows 10 after finding out Windows 10 S Mode does not allow using the Zoom which was the main purpose in buying this laptop. I found HP tech support to be very helpful and it was easy to follow the directions to convert over. I am very pleased with this product. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Hanson

customer_reviews.title: If You Need To Do Anything Important Don't Buy This
customer_reviews.text: This item said delivered, but didn't arrive for me, so I had to get it from another source. Almost half the 29 gigs are allocated to the system so it's perpetually low on storage. It's unbelievable how little storage it has. I've deleted almost everything and transferred my videos to an SD card. Still out of space. If you need storage, don't get this. 15 gigs runs out insanely quickly
customer_reviews.author: Ann Summer

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t get to try it!!
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately I can’t really review this product because I never really got to try it. I plugged it in, turned it on. I couldn’t find the start button on the screen to get it going. I called tech support for some help and since the gentleman couldn’t get in touch with HP because it was Sunday evening, he just issued me a refund. That was quick and easy, but I really wanted and needed a working laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Guillaume

customer_reviews.title: Never buy from Risingstars
customer_reviews.text: The screen is where most of the saving lives. I haven't played with the sound or anything much because the seller "Risingstars" sold me a used unit. The year of Office was not included and was registered with HP last year. HP tells me I may not be able to be given the code for the Office software. I may have to return yet another system
customer_reviews.author: nailsthatglow

customer_reviews.title: SLOOOOW!
customer_reviews.text: I trusted that a new HP laptop would be able to handle my moderate usage. I am a teacher and need a laptop for working with PDF files for teaching resources, MS Word & Excel, and email. I am not a gamer, I am not watching movies or storing hi res photos. This laptop shuts down constantly when I am using Acrobat to print teaching resources because it runs out of memory. It is SOOO slow on the internet, I think my old dial-up service in the 90s went faster! Ridiculous!!!
customer_reviews.author: Bec2011

customer_reviews.title: Sold as new, but was USED..
customer_reviews.text: Sold as NEW but came with someones return label partial stuck on. Not in original packaging. Sadly I'm returning immediately, without opening it.
customer_reviews.author: AriesDiva

customer_reviews.title: Must buy
customer_reviews.text: This laptop is really nice. We got this because we needed a 2 laptop for my kids to do schoolwork online. It’s super nice lightweight and I really like that the outside of the laptop has texture. It provides a good grip because of that. The color of the laptop is true as shown on Amazon. It’s really a great laptop and it come pretty fast too. And yes it was a new laptop not a Perown so please don’t worry about that if your looking into getting this laptop.
customer_reviews.author: BLANCA

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend except for network connection issues
customer_reviews.text: Good laptop except for the fact that it consistently drops network connection making it a challenge to use at times.
customer_reviews.author: Love to read

customer_reviews.title: Buy with ⚠️ ⚠️ ⚠️ ⚠️
customer_reviews.text: This is a great computer, however it is was not updated. Which was surprising because it was a new computer. I had to contact HP support and spend a whole day getting the system updated and getting everything reinstalled. That was a bit disappointing to my son who I got this for his birthday. Since the update it is working great. However I would recommend purchasing a laptop from a store and not online to avoid issues like this.
customer_reviews.author: Seria M

customer_reviews.title: Slow slooow sloooooow
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this computer. This computer has been nothing but trouble. There is a (no joke) 3 second delay from keyboard to screen appearance on the screen. I have reinstalled the OS via HP tech support. Spent 6 hours on the phone. HP support is great. It is just a bad product. It is very lightweight so it isn’t even good for home defense.
customer_reviews.author: Corliss Family

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Update: it crashed on me tonight. Not even a year old and it’s crap. I can’t wait to get a new one. Keeps disconnecting from the internet. Tried my sons laptop so we know it’s not the internet. Has trouble doing updates. Storage is terrible. Incredibly slow. I don’t know why I gave HP another chance because I had the same issues with my last HP. I would buy from another brand completely
customer_reviews.author: kaylee

customer_reviews.title: Little PC with giant capabilities
customer_reviews.text: Love this Computer. Light and portable. Perfect for my cloud-based business.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Product is as advertised very satisfied highly recommend set super easy
customer_reviews.author: Elisabeth

customer_reviews.title: put your money towards a better laptop
customer_reviews.text: I bought in the midst of desperately needing a laptop to get through quarantine. I have had it for exactly 3 months. And I wish I had never bought it. After the first few uses (and downloading NO ADDITIONAL PROGRAMS) it's slow. Like. Really slow. It takes a half hour to open up, draft, and send an email. And randomly getting kicked off wifi in the other reviews is accurate. It's barely functional for any purposes- I don't know anyone can use it for anything, let alone stream or for kids to use for e-learning.
customer_reviews.author: Jessiwo

customer_reviews.title: Celeron sucks
customer_reviews.text: I bought this laptop for home use, like browsing the net, small emails, doing little things like photo collages and other stuff which i remain to keep online. Unfortunately, it turned out to be extrememly slow. If i opened more than 1 application while browsing, everything was slow. I thought it was memory, saving space, internet... one by one i ruled out all issues and realised processor was the one. I thought, since its for minimal use, this should do but the processor turned out to be a disappointment. Additionally, you don't have keyboard lights, which i didn't realise while buying. Turns out, it is a bit of a struggle!
customer_reviews.author: Namijn

customer_reviews.title: Nice for writing or light Internet browsing
customer_reviews.text: It's a great computer for the price but the track pad is one of the worst to use so it's better to use a mouse. I wouldn't bother updating anything since the hard drive is very small, but it works terrific for a writing computer or some light Internet browsing. If you're looking for a gaming computer or a powerhouse, this isn't it.
customer_reviews.author: Krista L. Gossett

customer_reviews.title: Great little laptop UNTIL IT WENT BLACK AND FROZE
customer_reviews.text: Great little laptop for my Grand daughter even if she complains it lags now she did not have a problem when she got it so I need to take a look at what she has picked up or downloaded on it. Surprise it was lagging because it was failing evidently the drive or the motherboard went poof and problem is it wasn't that long after I got it. It has been sitting on my couch doing nothing because it is a piece of junk evidently. This is a common problem with these google it and you will see you are forewarned.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fully functional
customer_reviews.text: Had a relative in Texas receive this for me. I ordered a label through UPS to bring it to Guam. It arrived safe and sound, just a small delay considering the weather conditions in Texas. Great for my 9yr old to use for her distance schooling. Compact yet big enough to do all she needs it to do (Zooms, Google Classrooms, Google Drive activities, etc.) I found a simple tutorial to get out of S Mode and she is now able to get things done! Only concern is it gets pretty heated on the far left of keyboard but I believe that's normal with the start up and laptop working to update and do its thing.
customer_reviews.author: Guamgirl

customer_reviews.title: Loses connection constantly
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my son since he’s forced to do schooling online with the school closures. It doesn’t hold a wi-fi connection . It connects then loses connectivity almost immediately. My other two children were sitting next to me on their chrome books with no problems. I’m returning for a chrome book.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Wilson

customer_reviews.title: just a heavy non touch screen tablet
customer_reviews.text: After Downloading my pictures music and videos from a portable memory device I found that I couldn't add anything else. My sins game was too big to add to the laptop. So basically it's a typewriter that plays music and videos. This computer is just a piece of heavy junk unless you won't need it but once a month.
customer_reviews.author: pat sat

customer_reviews.title: Great first computer!
customer_reviews.text: This is the first computer I have ever owned ( I’m 40) I bought it for school and so far I love it ! It’s my favorite color, the screen is nice and clear and it’s very easy to use ( even for a tech noob like myself ) I am absolutely content with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Smith

customer_reviews.title: Don’t
customer_reviews.text: If I could give no stars I WOULD. This was a terrible purchase , would not stay on the internet long enough to even write a letter . I wish I hadn’t just thrown all the packaging away so I could have returned it since I ended buying a new laptop the day after this arrived
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Asdahl

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: I needed a cheap laptop in order to work from home during the coronavirus pandemic. I was a little skeptical about this one after reading so many reviews. I have had zero issues with the wireless kicking off and the computer operates smoothly and quickly for me. It's very lightweight, the screen is small, but I knew that before I purchased it. I'm able to work a full 9 hour day without having to charge the laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica nichols

customer_reviews.title: Great laptop
customer_reviews.text: Great laptop, bought it for my 11 year old daughter for school and it’s done everything she needs and more. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Henryg

customer_reviews.title: be careful who you buy from
customer_reviews.text: seller sold me a reconditioned unit with only 4 days left on the manufacturers one year warranty., it even had a walmart shipping label on the box that I only discovered after opening the box and getting it set up. it even had a virus that I was alerted to by my antivirus program and had to contact Microsoft to unlock the warning screen.
customer_reviews.author: William Evans

customer_reviews.title: Absolute Piece of Junk - Huge Waste of Time
customer_reviews.text: I wasted five hours of my life on the phone with HP and they still couldn’t get this thing to work. I had the same problem as the others. It constantly kicks you off of the WiFi. Most programs won’t run on it and it is pretty much useless.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Cardosa

customer_reviews.title: Slow computer
customer_reviews.text: I don't know anything about computers other than how to turn it on and web surf so it didn't need to have any special specs. It's so cute but ran entirely too slow. I only kept it 2 days. It couldn't even load the HP registration page. I had to register the device from my tablet. The next day it wouldn't play my YouTube recipes. I sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: L.S. Gilmore

customer_reviews.title: Great laptop
customer_reviews.text: My daughter got this for Christmas, and it’s still going strong. She loves it and we have had NO issues with it at all. She mostly uses it for roblox, school work, youtube, Netflix, etc., and it works perfectly. I’ve read some of the reviews, and feel lucky that we haven’t had any of the mentioned issues, so we can recommend this laptop. The color is great too!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer W

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t stay connected to internet
customer_reviews.text: Horrible internet connection, doesn’t stay connected and it lags horribly. Never buying again!!
customer_reviews.author: Paradise

customer_reviews.title: going to be a great computer for my needs.
customer_reviews.text: Just finish setting up computer love the features I’m super excited to utilize this computer although I’m not having the Wi-Fi disconnection issues as others have posted in their reviews but I can tell that this is going to be a great computer for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Fudgemuffet

customer_reviews.title: Nice laptop
customer_reviews.text: I was having trouble with my old laptop running our of storage space. This lalptop has plenty of storage for my needs and runs much faster than my last one. I haven't found anything I don't like about it. It was a really good laptop for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Rommel

customer_reviews.title: BUYER BEWARE- this is a BRICK
customer_reviews.text: This product is a paperweight- THEY NEED TO STOP SELLING IT. It cant even install the latest windows update- KNOWN ISSUE... and they keep selling them. DO RIGHT BY YOUR BUYERS- REFUND OR REPLACE THESE- I BOUGHT TWO- BRICKS!
customer_reviews.author: Jaime

customer_reviews.title: Good for a personal laptop
customer_reviews.text: I had to buy a new laptop so I could work from home so far so good it comes with everything I need already installed I didn't think I would like the Microsoft store but it does help you get what you need and keep your computer safe
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Win 10 S installed sucks but you can activate WIN10 Home for no cost. Have to disable power save for wifi to prevent it from turning off.
customer_reviews.author: G.R.

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this computer!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased two of these computers. One had been used before; there was already a username and password setup on the computer, so we couldn't log in. You would think that the company would have checked these, if they were computers that were returned before. The other keeps disconnecting from the internet constantly, while you are trying to use it; which is a warning that we saw from one of the other reviews. These are terrible! The problem is that we purchased these as Christmas gifts a couple of months ago, and now they need to be sent back, but we can't be sure we will get a refund. Hoping we can get our money back!
customer_reviews.author: CL

customer_reviews.title: Perfect and lightweight!
customer_reviews.text: My tween girl loves this lightweight durable laptop! She uses it at home and school with no issues. Perfect laptop for a kid!
customer_reviews.author: T'Kela Welch

customer_reviews.title: Good for light home schooling
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for PreK aged distance learning. Good for online assignments, Youtube, GoNoodle etc. Weak point is video conferencing as the camera isn't great. Recording video to upload isn't good either, it doesn't have the processing power required. Good purchase at the price, issues are to be expected at this price point.
customer_reviews.author: David Clow

customer_reviews.title: Marty
customer_reviews.text: This laptop was a gift to a new college student. I have not received feedback hence the 4 star and not 5.
customer_reviews.author: MBO

customer_reviews.title: So slow
customer_reviews.text: This is SO SLOW. I have nothing even downloaded on it and it’s insanely slow. Go with another brand and spare yourself the anxiety this gives you when a load screen sits there for 10 minutes trying to search a website. Light weight and love the color though.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Snow

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: It can barely stay connected to my WiFi. I do not like this computer.
customer_reviews.author: Jacinta Kwaah

customer_reviews.title: $15.00 refund for an expired warranty .. broken
customer_reviews.text: Purchased item late March. The keyboard by August is no longer operational (4 months) and the company sold a computer with an expired warranty. The company has graciously (insert snarky tone) is going to refund me $15.00.. I paid 253.00. The company misrepresented the product and it’s worth. I took it to the local computer barn that stated without the warranty the cost to fix would be more than the worth of the product. Don t bother with this company or cost.
customer_reviews.author: Cassidy Renfrew

customer_reviews.title: Buy something else!
customer_reviews.text: Don’t waste your money! The computer is very slow to begin with and we have top of the line internet, and it is soooooo slow!! A complete piece of crap!
customer_reviews.author: glovertl

customer_reviews.title: Blue Tech
customer_reviews.text: I needed this for work. This was perfect. Very affordable, easy to use and navigate. I wish I could have picked another color, but hey for the price I can't complain.
customer_reviews.author: Kepkim

customer_reviews.title: Trash
customer_reviews.text: Absolute trash. You get what you pay for. Runs excruciatingly slow, has trouble staying connected to every single wifi I’ve tried, the edges of the keyboard are sharp and painful, flimsy build, webcam is crap, takes forever to start up, only downloads windows programs exclusively (so no google chrome or drive), windows system is NOT user friendly. Would try to send it back and buy something ANYTHING else but I need it for courses now. Yeah, pretty much what you should expect from a $200 computer
customer_reviews.author: Joie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a preteen
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our daughter for Christmas. She loves it! Her only complaint is that it is a little slow to load. She is used to the quick start up of Chromebooks, so this is new to her. This laptop allows her to do schoolwork, watch videos, and play games with her friends.
customer_reviews.author: Kyna Magaña

customer_reviews.title: Bad buy
customer_reviews.text: Never live up to my expectation. The screen backlight is very low no matter how I turn it up. We have to be thumping the screen to get the touchscreen to work. Really sorry I bought this laptop!
customer_reviews.author: Denise l

customer_reviews.title: Mehh good starter laptop
customer_reviews.text: Received this as a Christmas gift and j must say I wish my bf didn't waste his money very cute light weight laptop. But its moves VERY slow no matter the internet, camera is terrible. Adds pictures as screen saver without asking and set up is someone complicated. I've had it since Christmas 2019 and just now reviewing wishing it got better but tbh it's just a basic slow laptop I've used 4 or 5 times. Love the size
customer_reviews.author: Sherese

customer_reviews.title: battery life is great!
customer_reviews.text: battery life is awesome, nice color in blue and a purple is also available, is light and just the right laptop for you basic computing needs and at less than $200.00 is a bargain.
customer_reviews.author: robert garcia

customer_reviews.title: Do not purchase
customer_reviews.text: We've had this laptop for 9 months. I would suggest spending more money for a better quality laptop. It freezes constantly and the microphone and camera have stopped working. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: E.A.

customer_reviews.title: Great computer
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this laptop for my son for Christmas. It is easy to navigate through, excellent screen display and very fast. Its actually better then my Acer laptop hands down! I've never purchased an HP before but I am so impressed by the quality and speed, I will have trade up now!
customer_reviews.author: lauren gaffney

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money at any price.
customer_reviews.text: Agognizing slow online. Many little bugs- quirks- mouse pad sticks in down(click) position. Scroll feature will go on for several pages on it's own. Construction feels cheap. Keys were advertised as "Backlit" They are not. Buy something else - life is too short to be this aggravated.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Its great!!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this computer. The color is beautiful. I have no problems with it. Runs great, fast, and is worth the money. The 1st one they sent me had a manufacturer defect but they replaced it no problem. I have had no problems with it. Budget friendly, and light weight. This computer is great!
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Barely works. Bare minimum done by delivery driver
customer_reviews.text: i asked the driver to place my package inside my home, as the door was unlocked and i didn't want my laptop outside in the cold. the driver did not do that, and the laptop sat outside for a couple of hours. i ran it and it's slow, won't connect to the internet and i wish i would've never spent money on it. terrible on y'alls delivery people.
customer_reviews.author: Olive Brewer

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Since i first got the laptop it been frozen and reset . I am so frustrating. I hated to return it since i lost the original box but it's useless i dont have a choice
customer_reviews.author: Kitubu

customer_reviews.title: Solid Compact Laptop
customer_reviews.text: Writing, email, online shopping and Internet searches. Dealing with Google email is a nightmare but that is certainly not the manufacturer's fault.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence Kinsman

customer_reviews.title: Expensive migraine causing doo doo
customer_reviews.text: Worst computer I have ever had. Often wont stream at all. Fickle on any website. Such a huge disappointment for a mom just trying to play some audiobooks for kids. I feel like this has to be a counterfeit or something?
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Brilhart

customer_reviews.title: This product sucks balls..Dont waste your time or money.
customer_reviews.text: Worst computer ever. Its brand new and gave not been able to use it. Freaking waste of money and too late to return. FML!
customer_reviews.author: Missy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for school for the price
customer_reviews.text: This works better than the last laptop I had. I had a Dell laptop I got from my college with my school loan money and it cost almost 500.00. It was a total piece of crap. Im never buy another Dell again. This laptop cost me less than half of what the dell cost and works way better and faster. It's great for school. browsing, email, music. Not really for gaming though.
customer_reviews.author: Sharlinda Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Great for online ordering and surfing the internet
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for a laptop starter not enough memory for any substantial project. Great for surfing the internet and online ordering
customer_reviews.author: Wannetta Mendoza

customer_reviews.title: Light blue nice laptop
customer_reviews.text: My 11 year old son really like this computer. The light blue color is really nice, light weight and easy to use. Very convenient.
customer_reviews.author: LaboriPonceña23

customer_reviews.title: Not happy at all!
customer_reviews.text: Brought it for my 12 yr old. She only does school work on it and after a month of using it it overheats and freezes! Videos never play and it’s not my WiFi connection
customer_reviews.author: Key

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for!
customer_reviews.text: It will not stay connected to the internet! The WiFi adapter is horrible. Every few minutes you have to run a troubleshoot to get it to reconnect. I love the color. The screen quality is good, but it is a huge hassle not being able to stay connected to the internet.
customer_reviews.author: brittany

customer_reviews.title: It's a good basic laptop
customer_reviews.text: It does well with installed programs but recognition time lags when typing or moving between websites. Other 4 GB machines I've had move quicker so it can't be blamed on RAM.
customer_reviews.author: Marc work

customer_reviews.title: Very basic laptop.
customer_reviews.text: This computer has very little storage/memory capacity. Good for a child’s first computer but not much more.
customer_reviews.author: CherylD

customer_reviews.title: A little slow
customer_reviews.text: This lap top is a little slow. It has a 5 second delay when you tap on something or when using the mouse. It doesn’t have a lot of room for stuff, GBs but I just use it for online homework and YouTube.
customer_reviews.author: Heather P.

customer_reviews.title: Good for the Value
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter to use for school and a little play. Great starter computer. No complaints at all
customer_reviews.author: George Amaro

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it over charged
customer_reviews.text: Charged me more then it was labeled for and product sticker came from Walmart liars
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed.
customer_reviews.text: Just delivered about 2 hours ago and I already hate it. Won’t stay connected to WiFi and it’s slow as Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Belle1

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: Everything works well. Just the screen had black spots at the bottom of screen when first turned on.
customer_reviews.author: Jake Davis

customer_reviews.title: HP Purple Lap Top
customer_reviews.text: First time user for Windows 10. I am still fingering it out after using Windows 7 for some time. I like the lite weight of the lap top. I love the purple
customer_reviews.author: Tanya Davis

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing! Wont stay connected to wi-fi and lags terribly!
customer_reviews.text: Does not stay connected to wi-fi. Ive lost so much work because of this awful device! Also, lags and freezes in intervals. Only used it once since set-up and I am so incredibly disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: 2SweetSons

product_meta.title: HP Stream 14-inch Laptop, Intel Celeron N3060 Processor, 4 GB SDRAM Memory, 32 GB eMMC Storage, Windows 10 Home in S Mode with Office 365 Personal for one Year (14-cb020nr, Infinity Purple)
product_meta.description: Style:14" HD Non-Touch Screen| Capacity:4 GB SDRAM, 32 GB eMMC Storage| Color:Infinity PurpleGet the essential productivity you want, without slowing down. This nimble laptop lets you easily shift from homework workhorse to marathoning your favorite shows.
feature_bullets: LAPTOP FOR WORK, SCHOOL, AND PLAY: With Office 365 and 1 TB of cloud storage, this device combines functionality, connectivity, style, and value.
PROCESSOR: Intel(R) Celeron(R) Dual-Core N3060 Processor, 1.6 GHz up to 2.48 GHz.
DISPLAY: 14-inch diagonal HD SVA BrightView WLED-backlit (1366x768).
BATTERY LIFE: Up to 9 hours (video playback); up to 7 hours and 45 minutes (wireless streaming).
THIN, LIGHT, AND PORTABLE (unpackaged): 13.27 inches (W) x 8.90 inches (D) x 0.70 inch (H); 3.17 pounds.
OPERATING SYSTEM AND WARRANTY: Windows 10 Home in S Mode and one-year limited warranty with 24-hour, 7 days a week web support.
